note:
Longtime fan with many interests; I read a ton of fanfic and watch a lot of fanvids. First fic I read was Trek fic in print zines, then I read MSR fic on internet archives. First vids I watched were on VHS. (I'm middle-aged, is what I'm saying.)

Geeky depressive polymath, prone to sarcasm. Non-drinker who likes barware. Minnesotan AF.

Current project: an epic guide to calibre & FanFicFare & how to use them with AO3. Much talk of this and other things on the Fan Tech Discord.
